events.title: Taylor Swift The Eras Tour
events.description: Join Taylor Swift on her highly anticipated sixth worldwide tour, The Eras Tour! The tour will celebrate all nine of her studio albums, from her self-titled debut to Folklore and Evermore. Swift will perform a medley of hits from each era, as well as never-before-heard songs and fan favorites. The tour will also feature special guests, such as HAIM and Bebe Rexha.

events.title: After Hours Til Dawn Tour
events.description: Prepare to be transported to a mesmerizing spectacle as The Weeknd embarks on his highly anticipated After Hours Til Dawn Tour. This global odyssey will showcase his captivating blend of soulful R&B, electrifying synth-pop, and dark undertones, all while immersing fans in his cinematic world. Expect a theatrical production that will ignite the senses and leave you breathless as The Weeknd performs anthems from his critically acclaimed albums After Hours and Dawn FM, as well as fan favorites from his extensive discography.

events.title: NewJeans - Get Up Tour
events.description: Get ready to get up and dance with NewJeans! The rising K-pop girl group is bringing their energetic and infectious music to your city. Fans can expect to hear all of their favorite hits, including Hype Boy, Cookie, OMG, and ASAP.

events.title: PERMISSION TO DANCE ON STAGE
events.description: BTS, the global K-pop sensation, is bringing their PERMISSION TO DANCE ON STAGE - LA tour to SoFi Stadium! This highly anticipated concert will feature all of BTS's greatest hits, as well as some new surprises. Fans can expect an unforgettable night of music, dance, and pyrotechnics.

events.title: Happier Than Ever, The World Tour
events.description: Billie Eilish, the Grammy Award-winning singer-songwriter, is bringing her Happier Than Ever, The World Tour to Singapore! This tour will support her latest album, Happier Than Ever, and will feature a mix of new and old songs. Fans can expect a visually stunning and emotionally charged performance.

events.title: Music of the Spheres World Tour
events.description: Coldplay, the Grammy Award-winning British rock band, is bringing their Music of the Spheres World Tour to Singapore! This tour will support their latest album, Music of the Spheres, and will feature a mix of new and old songs. Fans can expect a spectacular production with a focus on sustainability.

events.title: Ed Sheeran - + - = รท x Tour
events.description: Ed Sheeran, the Grammy Award-winning British singer-songwriter, is bringing his + - = รท x Tour to Singapore! This tour will support his latest album, =, and will feature a mix of new and old songs. Fans can expect an intimate and acoustic performance.
